document.full_text: the celtics made the knicks' return to the postseason brief, building a 23-point lead and holding on to sweep the first-round series, 4-0.
document.title: celtics 101, knicks 89: knicks fall, but not without a fight
lines_and_colors: the celtics made the knicks' return to the postseason brief, building a 23-point lead and holding on to sweep the first-round series, 4-0.
